original_title: Bon Jovi - This Left Feels Right Live
overview: In the fall of 2003, Bon Jovi released "This Left Feels Right", a collection of the band's greatest hits, stripping down each of the songs to its acoustic core before entirely recreating them in fresh, eclectic and innovative re-interpretations. The program was performed live at two intimate shows on November 14th & 15th, 2003 at Borgata Hotel Casino in Atlantic City, N.J.
title: Bon Jovi - This Left Feels Right Live
